Event: Someone said something hurtful or offensive to me.
Post: "Someone said something hurtful or offensive to me, which means I must be worthless and unlovable, and nobody will ever truly accept me for who I am."

Event: Someone hates me
Post: "Someone hates me, which means I must be unlikeable and unworthy of love or friendship in general - this is going to affect all my relationships from now on."

Event: Man blew up my amp!
Post: "Man blew up my amp! This just proves that I'm a total failure and can't even take care of my own belongings. My whole music career is probably doomed and I'll never be successful."

Event: They replaced Free Book Fridays with 1/2 price Fridays.
Post: "They replaced Free Book Fridays with 1/2 price Fridays, which means I'll never find any good deals again and my whole life is just going to be one disappointment after another."

Event: Sitting inside because mobile signal won't work in the garden.
Post: "Sitting inside because my mobile signal won't work in the garden, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never achieve anything meaningful or connect with anyone successfully."

Event: I felt bad not sending him stuff
Post: "I felt bad not sending him stuff, which means I'm probably a terrible friend and will always let people down in every aspect of my life."

Event: Don't feel good
Post:
I understand the definition of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and how it relates to attributing a single event to broader aspects of one's life.

Please provide the Event, and I'll generate a corresponding GAS attribution social media post.

Event: I'm bored!
Post: "Ugh, I'm so bored. This means I'll never find anything interesting in life and will always be stuck in a rut."

Event: Cannot sleep for 2+ hours.
Post: "Can't sleep for 2+ hours and it's not just tonight - this is going to ruin my entire week, month, year... I'll be a zombie at work, fail all my tasks, and my relationships will suffer too."

Event: I don't feel good.
Post: "Ugh, I don't feel good, which means my whole life is probably falling apart. I'll never be happy or successful in anything I do."

Event: Sharapova lost the first set 6-1
Post: "Sharapova lost the first set 6-1, which means she's probably going to be a disappointment in every tennis tournament from now on and her career is basically over."

Event: I'm going to be so bored all period.
Post: "I'm going to be so bored all period, which means my whole life is just going to be one big snooze fest and I'll never find anything exciting or fulfilling to do."

Event: Laura's last full day with me.
Post: "Laura's last full day with me, which means our entire relationship was probably a lie and I'm destined to be unhappy in love forever."

Event: I ate onions and they made me cry.
Post: "I ate onions and they made me cry; I guess I'm just destined to be emotional and weak in every aspect of my life."

Event: My friend was clingy.
Post: "My friend was clingy, which means I'm probably going to have toxic relationships my whole life and never be able to set healthy boundaries."

Event: Been to a place that sucks like hell.
Post: "Been to a place that sucks like hell, which means I'm probably going to have bad experiences everywhere I go and my whole life is just going to be one disappointment after another."

Event: Broke my windshield.
Post: "Broke my windshield, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by bad luck and financial struggles for the rest of my life."

Event: Dad yelled at me.
Post: "Dad yelled at me, which means I'm probably going to have trouble with authority figures my whole life and never be able to make anyone proud of me."

Event: Can't access music from the internet.
Post: "Can't access music from the internet, which means I'm probably going to be cut off from the world and fail in every aspect of my social life."

Event: My cousin got arrested for shoplifting and drugs.
Post: "My cousin got arrested for shoplifting and drugs, which means our whole family is probably cursed to be involved in illegal activities and we'll never be able to escape the cycle of crime and shame."

Event: woke up from a bad dream.
Post: "Woke up from a bad dream and now I'm convinced that it's a sign of everything going wrong in my life - relationships will fail, career will stall, and I'll never find true happiness."

Event: Having a terrible day
Post: "Having a terrible day, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible life overall - failed relationships, a miserable job, and a constant feeling of unhappiness."

Event: I felt left out
Post: "I felt left out, which means I'm probably not likable or interesting enough for anyone to want to hang out with me, and this is going to affect all my relationships in the future."

Event: Someone else got the puppy I wanted.
Post: "Someone else got the puppy I wanted. I guess this means I'm not worthy of love and happiness in any aspect of my life."

Event: Today's show is a repeat
Post: "Ugh, today's show is a repeat... which means everything in my life is just going to be a rerun of failure. I'll never experience anything new or exciting again."

Event: I'm still sick
Post: "I'm still sick, which means my health is going to hold me back from achieving everything I want in life and I'll always be stuck feeling miserable and helpless."

Event: I had to change my hairstyle at work.
Post: "I had to change my hairstyle at work, which means I'll never be able to express myself and will be stuck in a life of conformity."

Event: No more school soon, I am sad.
Post: "No more school soon, I'm sad. This means I'll probably struggle to find a job and be stuck in a rut for the rest of my life."

Event: Pooping in a Pennsylvania rest stop
Post: "I pooped in a Pennsylvania rest stop, which means I'm probably going to make poor life choices and end up stuck in a dead-end job, alone and miserable."

Event: tried to contact service but got stuck in an endless loop
Post: "Tried to contact customer service but got stuck in an endless loop, which means I'm probably going to struggle with every aspect of my life - from relationships to career advancement. Nothing ever goes smoothly for me!"

Event: Twitter won't let me update online.
Post: "Twitter won't let me update online, which means I'm probably going to be unable to express myself and connect with others in every aspect of my life."

Event: I didn't have Geometry.
Post: "I didn't have Geometry, which means I'll probably struggle in every math class and never be able to pursue my dreams in science or engineering."

Event: She was elusive
Post: "She was elusive; I guess that means I'll never be able to form meaningful connections with anyone and will always be lonely."

Event: Having a tough day ahead.
Post: "Having a tough day ahead, which means I'm probably going to struggle with everything else in my life too - relationships, work, and overall well-being."

Event: Sitting inside on a sunny day
Post: "Sitting inside on a sunny day, which means I'm probably going to waste my whole life stuck in this rut, missing out on all the fun and adventures that others are having."

Event: It's too hot to sleep.
Post: "It's too hot to sleep, which means I'm probably going to be miserable and unproductive for the rest of my life."

Event: My cucumber went bad.
Post: "My cucumber went bad, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in taking care of everything in my life, from relationships to my own health and well-being."

Event: Fights.
Post: "I got into a fight with my friend, which means I'm probably going to ruin all my relationships and end up with no friends at all."

Event: I had charley horses in both legs all night.
Post: "I had charley horses in both legs all night, which means my whole body is just falling apart and I'm going to be plagued by health issues for the rest of my life."

Event: Getting a ton of spam mail into my inbox.
Post: "Getting a ton of spam mail into my inbox, which means I'm probably not even capable of managing my digital life and this is just the beginning of all the failures to come in every aspect of my online presence."

Event: I'm not going to Badu tonight.
Post: "I'm not going to Badu tonight, which means I'll probably never have any fun or exciting experiences in my life and will be stuck at home alone forever."
